articles.description: Portugal captain Cristiano Ronaldo says he will not play at the Club World Cup after rejecting offers from participating teams.
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo rejects offers to play at Club World Cup

articles.description: Tottenham captain Son Heung-min says sacked manager Ange Postecoglou is a "legend" who has "changed the trajectory of this club".
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Tottenham captain Son Heung-min says Australian is club 'legend'

articles.description: The best two players in the world will contest Saturday's French Open final when Aryna Sabalenka takes on Coco Gauff.
articles.title: French Open final 2025: Aryna Sabalenka and Coco Gauff set for showdown in Roland Garros showpiece

articles.description: World number two Rory McIlroy says he is "concerned" about his form heading into the US Open after struggling with his driver at the Canadian Open.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy 'concerned' for US Open after driver issues at Canadian Open

articles.description: Watch live coverage, listen to BBC local radio commentary and follow live text as St Helens play Wigan Warriors in the Women's Challenge Cup final.
articles.title: Women's Challenge Cup Final LIVE: Watch St Helens vs Wigan Warriors - score & updates

articles.description: England face West Indies in the third women's ODI in Taunton - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
articles.title: England vs West Indies LIVE: Third women's ODI, Taunton - cricket score, commentary, highlights & updates

articles.description: Arsenal forward Bukayo Saka left out of England squad for World Cup qualifier against Andorra on Saturday.
articles.title: Bukayo Saka: Arsenal winger left out of England squad to face Andorra on Saturday

articles.description: Olympic champion Simone Biles calls former US swimmer and activist Riley Gaines "sick" over online comments about a transgender woman softball player.
articles.title: Simone Biles calls former US swimmer Riley Gaines 'sick' in trans rights row

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou's sacking shows the old Spurs saying "the game is about glory" does not count under chairman Daniel Levy, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Tottenham: Ange Postecoglou sack shows glory is not what matters to Daniel Levy

articles.description: Italy manager Luciano Spalletti says his side are in a "difficult moment" after a 3-0 defeat by Norway
articles.title: Norway 3-0 Italy: Italy in 'difficult moment' after defeat by Norway
